Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First I need to look at the event log and identify which activities are repeated in the same case Lets go through each case one by one Starting with Case C001 The activities are Initiate Request Verify Documents Call Customer Submit Additional Verify Documents again and Approve Request So Verify Documents appears twice here The first time the context is that the agent checks identity documents Then after the customer submits additional info the agent rechecks

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Next Case C002 The activities are Initiate Request Verify Documents Call Customer Adjust Account Call Customer again Approve Request Here Call Customer appears twice The first call is to clarify an account discrepancy the second is a followup to confirm adjustments Also Adjust Account is unique here but maybe check if its repeated elsewhere

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking at Case C003 Initiate Request Verify Documents Call Customer Adjust Account Verify Documents again Approve Request Similar to C001 Verify Documents is done twice The first is physical verification at the branch then after an account adjustment Also Call Customer here is when the customer steps out so maybe Call Customer While Waiting or something like that

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now looking across all cases the activity Call Customer is repeated in C001 C002 and C003 Each time the context is different in C001 its to request missing docs in C002 its to clarify discrepancies and then followup in C003 its because the customer stepped out So each instance needs a unique name based on the reason Similarly Verify Documents appears in C001 C002 C003 The first two times in C001 and C002 are initial verification but in C003 the first verification is physical So maybe Verify Initial Documents Verify Physical Documents and ReVerify Documents depending on the context

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Another thing is Adjust Account appears in C002 and C003 In C002 its after a call to clarify discrepancies and in C003 its due to missing info So maybe Adjust Account Details and Correct Account Information or something similar

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Let me think of possible renamed activities For Call Customer in C001 maybe Request Missing Documents via Call or Call Customer for Missing Docs In C002s first call Call Customer for Clarification or Clarify Discrepancy Call Second call in C002 Followup Call to Confirm Adjustments In C003 Call Customer While Waiting or Call Customer for Return

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Verify Documents in C001 first time Verify Initial Documents or Initial Document Verification Second time ReVerify Documents or Recheck Documents In C002s Verify Documents Verify Identity Documents since its part of identity verification In C003s first Verify Documents Verify Physical Documents since its done by a branch officer and involves physical checks The second Verify Documents after adjustment ReVerify Documents After Adjustment

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Adjust Account in C002 Adjust Account Details or Modify Account Information In C003 Correct Account Information or Adjust Account Due to Missing Info Also the Submit Additional activity in C001 is unique so maybe keep it as Submit Additional Documents or Submit Additional Information

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Now I need to make sure that the renamed activities are consistent and clear Let me check each case again with these renamed activities For Case C001 Initiate Request same no change Verify Documents first is Verify Initial Documents second is ReVerify Documents Call Customer Call Customer for Missing Documents Submit Additional Submit Additional Documents Approve Request same Case C002 Initiate Request same Verify Documents Verify Identity Documents Call Customer first is Call Customer for Clarification second is Followup Call to Confirm Adjustments Adjust Account Adjust Account Details Approve Request same Case C003 Initiate Request same Verify Documents first is Verify Physical Documents second is ReVerify Documents After Adjustment Call Customer Call Customer While Waiting Adjust Account Correct Account Information Approve Request same This seems to cover all instances

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: I should also check if there are any other activities that might need renaming For example Submit Additional in C001 is unique so no need to rename Adjust Account in C002 and C003 are different contexts so renaming them as Adjust Account Details and Correct Account Information makes sense
